note:
- Constructive criticism
- Proper sources of information (e.g. Deutschlandfunk in Germany)
- 活到老学到老 (As long as you live you learn)
- Fairness and cooperation before egotism and esurience
- Probably don't believe everything you think
- "Life before death, strength before weakness, journey before destination. I will protect those who cannot protect themselves. I will protect even those I hate so long as it is right."
